title: Overanalysis
text: We have no good choices now.
effecta: xxDISCARD Keel is shaken and loses his action for this round.

title: Shoot the Messenger
text: Why the ever loving fuck did you let things get so bad?
effecta: xxDISCARD If Keel is in the same location as Menas, make Keel and Menas angry. Keel is unavailable for the rest of the mission.

title: Doubt
text: I'm giving it my best - and it's not enough.
effecta: xxDISCARD Thea is unavailable for the rest of the mission. Discard Thea's character card and any attached assets.

title: On the Grift
text: No one appreciates the breath of life like I do.
